text:
K.S. Palanisamy, District Collector, on Thursday, handed over a new-born baby boy to a Salem-based private adoption centre.

In a release here, the Collector said the child was found abandoned, within a few hours after birth, on December 9 at the Primary Health Centre at Navalpattu. It was admitted to the Mahatma Gandhi Government Hospital where it was under close observation. The child was handed over to the authorities of the private adoption centre on Thursday.
title: Abandoned baby finds a home
